name: FactsaboutColor
0:
”Alexa, open color facts.”
”Alexa, ask color facts to tell me a fact!”
”Alexa, tell color facts to give me another!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color facts
des: Made for the curious in mind, this skill will tell you facts that range from color science to implementations in the world today. Ever wondered how many colors are visible to the naked eye, or why school buses are yellow? You may be surprised by the answer! Whether you're into fact skills or just a big fan of color, learn something new today that will totally change how you see the world. Stop signs are red for a reason, after all!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
